title: Podcast Episode 39.1 – ROUGH SKETCH by Kate Canterbary
description:
Our audiobook this week
is ROUGH SKETCH by USA Today Bestselling
Author Kate Canterbary! 



Narrated by Christian
Fox and Savannah Peachwood 



Smart, successful, and
sitting pretty at the top of her game, Neera Malik has it all figured out. Save
for the small issue of Gustavo Guillmand.



The artist with a
cult—and Instagram—following has a problem and it's not his preference for
shirtless selfies. 



No, he has an attitude
problem, a minding his own business problem, an infuriatingly sexy problem. 



They can't stand each
other and they can't stay away from each other. 



ROUGH SKETCH by Kate
Canterbary (ebook preorder): https://bit.ly/2LwjDQq



The Walsh Series by Kate
Canterbary (Kindle Unlimited): https://amzn.to/2JTO3sx



FRESH CATCH by Kate
Canterbary: https://amzn.to/2xVcmRo



MAGNOLIA CHRONICLES by
Kate Canterbary: https://amzn.to/30H7QSP



Kate Canterbary
Website:
http://katecanterbary.com



Giveaway! https://bit.ly/2LwjDQq



UNTIL HER by Aurora
Rose Reynolds: https://amzn.to/2LwCydP



THIS IS WILD by Natasha
Madison: https://amzn.to/2SpB2uN
